DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to see if some tests of hand movement, strength, and function are valid for children with burns.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Hand Assessments in Children With Severe Hand Burns
DOC.detailed_description: Children will be given a battery of tests to determine the validity of these measures for children with severe hand burns. The tests include: - Pinch and grip strength; - Stereognosis; - Speed of manipulation using the Nine Hole Peg Test, Box & Blocks Test, and the Moberg Pickup Test; - Measurement of Range of Motion of the wrist and fingers.
DOC.criteria: Third degree brns to one or both hands All areas closed Age between 5 and 18 years old English or Spanish speaking Previous hand condition Unable to follow 2 step directions
